title: Unfiltered: 24 Hours On A 4th Generation Dairy Farm

tasks.task: Touring a dairy farm and recording activities
subtasks: Observing cows being brought into the dairy
Operating a hydraulic lever to dispense grain for the cows
Recording the cows' response to the grain
Noting the direct release of milk from the udders (milking process)
Performing a drone flight over the farm
Enjoying a camp cook-up with fresh dairy products (eggs, beef, lamb)
Grilling the cows directly after they were milked
